name: Black Forest Cake Cooking Chef
description:
Try this truly fantastic shape of usual bakery – amazingly sweet cakes and pies with different fillings, including the famous German Black Forest gateau! Learn all the recipes and do your best to create the most delicious pies with some drinks for tired people playing Black Forest Cake Cooking Chef game!

Become the best cooking chef of this pixel city! Every human being needs some sweet dessert during his/her workday! So be ready to welcome people in your small bakery making them the most delicious pies and cakes they’ve ever eaten! Mix such fantastically fresh ingredients as fresh black berries, sweet creams, jams, fillings, and toppings to achieve an unbelievable success in real European pies cooking!

Good responses can make your ratings rise really fast! Remember that the customers go really mad when they are hungry, so make haste! Do your best and cook every recipe of fantastically delicious pies step by step and don’t confuse the orders; otherwise, every client can even close your café! Dilute fantastically cooked food with the fresh tea, coffee or cocktail and watch your clients’ smiles!

Just earn some points making fantastically berry cakes and fruit pies and unlock new interesting and difficult recipes! Use more ingredients, create your own style for your cooking space and make the life of this pixel city really delicious!
Learn how it is to become a real bakery cooking chef! Play Black Forest Cake Cooking Chef game and just have fun!

Black Forest Cake Cooking Chef features:
• Cook outstanding apple and berry pies right in your small bakery
• Enjoy wide range of sweet food recipes
• Customize your kitchen space as you wish
• Watch your rating rising with every client’s smile!
